name: Collection (MagicAutomaton)
description:
Game for 100th mini jam, and my 10th game submitted on itch.io as well.

Theme: overload

Limitation: chaos is everything

...hmmm... I have to say this may not be a satisfying game...

In fact I mainly made it in memory of '100th' and '10th'...

Joining jams makes me more creative, I can feel that I'm doing a much better work than when I first tried designing games. And also, playing jam games, not only top rated ones but others as well, is an excellent experience.

After all, thanks for your playing!
